title: r/Pettyrevenge A Karen Hoarded All The Toilet Paper, So I Got Revenge!
description:
r/Pettyrevenge During the height of the corona virus scare, OP encounters an insane Karen in a super market who hoards a cart full of toilet paper. She even steals some of OP's toilet paper! So, OP does the only logical thing: she rushes ahead of the Karen and steals all of the next thing on her shopping list. Turnabout is fair play, Karen! If you enjoyed this video, let me know by hitting that like button!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=28HOrOgUbps
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
